attributes.action: Eradicate Body Ideals in the Media
attributes.additional_details: Everyone is beautiful in every sense of the word. We have strived to create this idea for years now, yet the media continues to contradict us through unrealistic body ideals for both men and women. Help us eradicate these body ideals by signing our petition to have the government make magazines and TV shows more accepting towards those of both genders and all body types.
